english: Most or all of the economy should be nationalized
Capitalism should fundamentally be replaced
There should be a national healthcare service
Government owned industry is usually a bad idea
The government should run the healthcare insurance industry
Public utilities like roads and electricity should all be publicly owned
Capitalism has problems
Some industries such as the postal service should be government-run
Regulation cannot fix all problems in the economy
Strictly regulated capitalism is the ideal economy
For any economic problem, there is a regulation that can fix it
Companies that sneakily break regulations and are caught should be disbanded
The government must regulate the economy to protect the environment
The government is needed to break up monopolies and ensure there is fair competition
Government regulations rarely completely solve the problem they intended to fix
The economy should consist of private companies with some regulations to ensure fair competition
Consumer protection laws to ensure products are safe are important
The government should not regulate the economy at all
Everything that can be left to the free market should be
The government should never break up a company
Government intervention in the economy almost always makes the economy worse
The market will always make the best product unless the government intervenes
Excessive government intervention hurts the economy
Oppression by corporations is a much more real threat than oppression by the government
Competition generally makes the economy better
Capitalism is better than any existing alternative
It should be legal to scream fire in a crowded building when there's no fire
There should be no police force
There should be no legal repercussions for using extremely offensive language
There should be no legal repercussions for supporting any ideology
Cracking down on speech usually makes what you were trying to censor spread more
Freedom of speech is an important concept
Protesting is a way of showing patriotism
Police should be regulated more
Whistleblowers should be strongly protected
I support the right for people I disagree with to voice their opinions
The government has no business looking into most people's personal lives
The government should not prosecute people for expressing an opinion
Those who disagree with the government should be removed from the country
Protesting the government should be illegal
The government should monitor all citizens to combat terrorism
Police need more power and protection
If you have nothing to hide, you should have nothing to fear from the government monitoring your communications
Whistleblowers who leak classified information that costs lives should be prosecuted
We must sacrifice some freedoms to protect our country from terrorism
Government surveillance is necessary in the modern world
It is important for national security that some materials are classified
The government should have access to the emails of suspected terrorists
The government should be able to access the phones of convicted criminals to find additional criminals
The government should never be able to prosecute someone for the truth, even if it is a matter of national security
People who spread misinformation should be punished
Speculations and facts which cannot be confirmed for certain should never be published
Social media platforms should be required to remove posts which promote conspiracy theories
You should not have the right to make claims which are provably false
The media should be penalized for reporting false headlines
Officials who intentionally deceive the population should be in prison
Social media should be responsible for fact checking advertisements that they host
The media should make more of an effort to report facts rather than opinions
The media should report facts even when the media disagrees with the implications of them
Truth is relative
Facts are not real, there are multiple sides to everything
You should not have complete freedom of speech
Gay marriage should be illegal
We should have a national religion
Premarital sex should be illegal
Religious values should be taught in all schools
People should be able to volunteer for experimental treatments when they have no treatment and will die if they do not
It is important to maintain family values
We should have a national language and all immigrants should be required to speak it
The media is biased against traditional values
There are only 2 genders
Murder and theft should be illegal
Abortion should always be legal
It should be legal to alter your infant's DNA to make them stronger, smarter, etc.
If AI can govern better than humans can, then AI should rule
Cars should be banned to protect the environment
The government should require people to eat healthy
Genetic modification research should be legal on humans
Guns should be banned for the general population
There should be a limit to how many children a person may have to prevent overcrowding the Earth
Private jets should be banned
Plastic straws should be banned
We should put effort into expanding civilization beyond earth
Climate change is a real threat
Technological progress is always good
Automation has the potential to give significant benefits to humanity
Evolution should be taught in schools
All drugs should be legal for the adult population
It is sometimes necessary to ban some substances from the general population
Prostitution should be legal
Marijuana should be legal for the adult population
Pornographic materials should be legal for the adult population
Smoking should be legal
The government should not officially support any religion (or lack of religion)
Freedom of religion is an important concept
Constant war is needed to make an economy thrive
My nation should conquer other nations
There is nothing wrong with taking the resources of weaker nations
International law should not bind my nation
If a nation produces materials for us for a low price using cheap labor, we should still buy
My nation should only help other nations when it suits our interests
It is important for a government to maintain a strong military so that it can have global influence
A nation without a military is a weak nation
Diplomatic options should always be tried before war is even considered
Overthrowing our enemies usually makes the situation worse than how it started
Military spending is a waste of money
Any deals that another nation wants must be bad for us
Our nation would do better if it did not involve itself with other nations
Our nation should never initiate a war
We should make products in our own nation whenever possible
It is a waste of our soldiers and resources to topple other governments, regardless of what they do
We must respect the sovereignty of other nations, even those who go against our principles
My nation should focus primarily on domestic policy
Foreign policy has little influence on most people's daily lives
It is important for our government to interact with its neighbours
I care that other nations respect my nation
The world would be better off if countries diplomatically united into a single world government
In order for humanity to survive, we must get past having separate nations
We are first and foremost citizens of Earth
It is our duty to care for the citizens of other countries the same as we care for the citizens of our own
The United Nations should be more powerful
I support regional unions such as the European Union
All governments should be held accountable to the international community for things such as war crimes
It is our duty to topple regimes that violate human rights
International cooperation is generally beneficial
International alliances are important to protect my nation
Nations should cooperate with each other unless there is a compelling reason not to
Foreign aid is a waste of money
It is important to protect our national identity from other cultures
The government would be best if the people directly voted on most issues
Trials would be better if put directly to popular vote
The government should almost always follow the majority opinion
The population as a whole tends to make good decisions
A country without fair elections cannot be a good country
Each person should have an identically weighted vote
People should have the power to choose their leaders
The government must be by the people for the people
Popular opinion is not always right
Democracy often allows the majority to infringe on the rights of those who dissent
Popular opinion should have little influence on government policy
My country should not have elections or votes
A nation must have strong leadership to be successful
The government occasionally needs to do things which aren't popular for the good of its people
Society could not function without leaders and followers
Society requires that some people must have power over others to function
If given the chance, I would implement my ideology in my country, even if most people were against it
People who get into power should keep power until they are forced to give it up
A nation should obey its leadership without question
The government should not tolerate dissenting opinions
People should question the actions of those in power
The government is larger than it needs to be
The government has too much power
I do not trust the government to look after my interests
Small government is usually better than big government
There can never be a government without corruption
The population can protect itself better than the government can protect it
The government should have no say in how people live their lives
People would be better off without a government
A government provides some important services for the population
Those who take credit for the work of others should lose everything
Children should not be able to inherit anything from their parents
Your income should be directly tied to the value of what you produce
Children of the wealthy should only be able to become wealthy if they have their own independent idea
It should not matter who you are, only what you can do
Banks should tolerate more risk for disadvantaged communities to give them the opportunity to succeed as well
Need based scholarships are important for allowing gifted students from poor families to be able to succeed
You should be able to become rich if you work harder than everyone else regardless of how wealthy your family was
Those who work especially hard should be rewarded with more wealth
Communism, if implemented correctly, would be better than capitalism
From each according to his ability, to each according to his need
All people should get the same rewards regardless of their work
There should be no billionaires
I would support a maximum wage
People should be guaranteed enough to live regardless of whether they work
Healthcare should be a right guaranteed to all people

All people should be guaranteed housing

I would not want to live in a country where everyone had the same salary

There should be no welfare

Wealthy districts should not be allowed to put additional money into their school districts when less wealthy districts can't afford to do the same

I should not have to pay for things that I get no benefit from
We should reduce our welfare program
